Package org.historyresearchenvironment.databaseadmin.listeners

Listener classes to extend the user interface

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HexFocusListener
    Make sure that the number of characters is even
    HexVerifyListener
    Limit input to valid hex characters
    IntegerListener
    Limit INTEGER fields to legel values
    LengthFocusListener
    Make sure that the number of characters is not bigger than MAX CHAR
    NumericVerifyListener
    Verify that Text input is numeric
    SmallIntListener
    Limit SMALLINT fields to legal values

Package org.historyresearchenvironment.databaseadmin.listeners Description
